Room.Name: Kista Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Kista Avenue traveling north-south.
Room.LongDescription: There is a flower shop that specializes in rare and exotic plants and flowers on the east side of the avenue. A retired botanist lives in the quarters above the shop, although some whisper that he isn't really retired, but simply found something in his research that he didn't want to share with the University. They say he continues his research in secret now.
